English: Thank you! (End)\n

My people and I greet you Stranger. I've heard from your actions and your name many talked about was... {PlayerName}, right? Well then, we are not greedy, so we share this Epic Gift with you. You get it only once, so take care of it with your life!
Zirax Commander
Talon Shaman
Polaris General
Hello... Human or {PlayerName} as they call you. You got my respect to get Honored with my Race. Take this Token as gift but when you lose it, we will kill you.
Hello {PlayerName}. Your actions speak for yourself and we thank you for all what you have done for us. Take this Token as gift and use it wisely.
You are not worth to speak to me! Get out of my sight!
You got my gift already and dare to talk to me again?!? Get out of my sight or I'll kill you!
Sorry, but I don't think it's time for us yet. Go and help my Race and come back when we are honored from your actions!
You got my gift already. Please don't tell me that you lost it...
Who are you? As long as my people don't know you, I don't know you either. Go away!
You got our gift already! If you lost it, our people will never forget it!
Mission Keeper
You need all 3 Epic Gift Tokens from the Factions to be able to play the <color=#fd9b00>[b]Gold Freighter Heist Mission![/b]</color>
Well done and enjoy the Treasures! Make sure to not lose those Tokens!
What mission is this? (Start the Mission)
Ok thanks, let's go! (End)
The Gold Freighter Heist Mission is a legendary farm Mission. Only to those accessible, who got the Epic Gift Tokens from all 3 Factions!
Oh {PlayerName}. I see you have the holy statue of our people. Do you want to give it to me?
You need a friendly reputation or better to the Talon
Deutsch: then I will to talk to you

First I draw cards for you, then for myself. Whoever comes closest to Number 21 wins. The card I draw has the number from 1 to 11. After each card you have the choice to stop.\nIf you win, you get my part on top of your bet.
